about.name: Nyein Phyo Aung
about.intro: Hi, I'm Nyein Phyo Aung. I'm software developer specialize in building and maintaining web applications using JavaScript and modern frameworks. I'm committed to improving my skills with a focus on delivering high-quality, user-friendly experiences. Passionate about continuous learning, I stay updated with industry trends and strive to create efficient, scalable solutions.

experience.title: Associate Developer
description: Developed responsive Angular SPAs leveraging two-way data binding, dependency injection, and component-based architecture for clients in aviation, government, and telecom
Designed and optimized MySQL databases with efficient schemas and complex queries to support web applications
Assisted in data migration projects using SSMS and MySQL, developing scripts for data extraction and transformation
Collaborated in Agile/Scrum environments, participating in sprint planning and cross-functional team delivery

education.institute: University of Technology - Yatanarpon Cyber City
